creator: danielv@bheltry.co.in
text:
I am using Tomcat 3.2.1 on Solaris 8 (Intel). When I try to run the JSP
examples, the server goes into a loop. I checked in the worker/ directory and 
found the compiler was looping. I am giving the segment below. This happens
with all the JSPs. Kindly help me to solve this problem.

            // HTML // begin [file="/export/home/jakarta-tomcat-3.2.1/webapps/ex
amples/jsp/num/numguess.jsp";from=(0,0);to=(9,0)]
                out.write("<!--\r\n  Copyright (c) 1999 The Apache Software Foun
dation.  All rights \r\n  reserved.\r\n\r\n  Number Guess Game\r\n  Written by J
ason Hunter, CTO, K&A Software\r\n  http://www.servlets.com\r\n-->\r\n\r\n");
out.write("<!--\r\n  Copyright (c) 1999 The Apache Software Foundation.  All rig
hts \r\n  reserved.\r\n\r\n  Number Guess Game\r\n  Written by Jason Hunter, CTO
, K&A Software\r\n  http://www.servlets.com\r\n-->\r\n\r\n");

thanking you,

V Paul Daniel
Sr. Systems Engr.
Informatics Centre
Bharat Heavy Electricals Ltd
Tiruchirapalli-620014
INDIA
Not enough data, the jsp works for most people - can't reproduce it.
